Audio podcast episodes (also on YouTube).

Page 2 of 4

  • What is the W3C doing about AI?
    June 2024
    This looks at the latest W3C report on AI and its impact on the web. It explores the future of AI standards and ethics.

  • How web typography has evolved
    June 2024
    We talk about how web typography has evolved to meet new technological and social demands.

  • What’s new in web images. Are they worth a thousand words?
    May 2024
    We have new image formats and CSS properties to control images. But serving ever smaller and bigger screen resolutions efficiently is no easy feat.

  • User Preferences:- rethinking web design
    May 2024
    About the 6 new CSS media queries that let us design unique experiences according to the preferences the website visitor sets in their device or browser.

  • Does Baseline solve our browser support problems?
    April 2024
    Baseline is a Google initiative introduced in 2023 that aims to make it easier for developers and other website stakeholders to understand what might be ready for production.

  • Designing an effective homepage
    April 2024
    We critique a design of the show's future homepage against what experts from UX, copywriting, SEO and marketing might say.
